en: It has a palm nut which is black.

ngiemboon: Pi lɔɔn ńtó, pi júu sésɛ̌ ńná né mèŋ.
en: If you arrive, buy these to give to me.

ngiemboon: Pi ge pí lelÿɔʼ tɔ́ɔn séshÿɔ́ʼɔ?
en: How many yams are you going to take?

ngiemboon: Tè tyé sesoŋ, tyé pɔ́ legʉŋ.
en: Don't stand in the center, stand to the side.

ngiemboon: Mepfo mɔ́ɔn ée mémbʉ́a. Tàʼ zěm, setsɔ́ té zém.
en: I have two kola trees, one produced and the other did not produce.

ngiemboon: A gʉa na melÿɔ́ʼ mɛ̀, esɛ̀ zɔ̌ poŋ.
en: Among these yams, this is the one that is good.

ngiemboon: À gɔɔn ngie mèŋ ńgʉa na pɔ̀ɔn ńkaa sɛ̌?
en: He asks me to carry which bags?
